fields.description: *Assessment* While attempting to reproduce the EUCA-11175 on AWS to compare behaviors, when DescribeImages was executed against AWS, it contained a stateReason attribute which explained why the AMI failed to be created: {code} Client.InstanceTerminated:User has terminated or rebooted the instance Client.InstanceTerminated:User has terminated or rebooted the instance {code} Full verbose output below: {code} $ ec2-describe-images ami-f76cb19c --verbose Setting User-Agent to [ec2-api-tools 1.6.10.1] Setting User-Agent to [ec2-api-tools 1.6.10.1] ------------------------------[ REQUEST ]------------------------------- 2015-07-22T12:18:46.419Z 2015-07-22T12:23:46.419Z  106pxToc6zNPUCNciAcfM7hWsQs= Q8jtBlIpcS2CtKClURkM2LETjuQ= yBwBBfVFg5MgZc1h8oODztDol8zmX970HG8p3Y43SfDZ6ThTZfxT5+/p4yk30h8ByrQW48WwkHEF fpbRKS2PrftyAwLPNXbtKMKF421naYDB7maxP83/9EECI9y6j1zKnWOQ+LNRxFnwJFml98JqtrA7 oQcKUpdFlAdGUJ1ADaI= ami-f76cb19c ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ------------------------------[ RESPONSE ]------------------------------ e61360c4-b251-46eb-ad85-3b87c9daa1da ami-f76cb19c 986451091583/ubuntu-wily-amd64-ebs-pv failed 986451091583 false x86_64 machine aki-919dcaf8 Client.InstanceTerminated:User has terminated or rebooted the instance Client.InstanceTerminated:User has terminated or rebooted the instance ubuntu-wily-amd64-ebs-pv Ubuntu 15.10 Wily Werewolf EBS Paravirtual AMI ebs /dev/sda1 /dev/sda1 true standard /dev/sdb ephemeral0 paravirtual xen ------------------------------------------------------------------------ IMAGE ami-f76cb19c 986451091583/ubuntu-wily-amd64-ebs-pv 986451091583 failed private x86_64 machine aki-919dcaf8 ebs paravirtual xen BLOCKDEVICEMAPPING EBS /dev/sda1 true standard BLOCKDEVICEMAPPING EPHEMERAL /dev/sdb ephemeral0 {code} On Eucalyptus, when the EMI failed, there wasn't a stateReason which would help provide a better user experience when the EUCA-11175 is hit. {code} # euca-describe-images emi-4e95cc1e --debug 2015-07-22 06:30:32,957 DEBUG DescribeImages parsed arguments: {'all': False, 'filters': None, 'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'region': None, 'ImageId': ['emi-4e95cc1e'], 'show_empty_fields': False, 'Owner': None, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None, 'ExecutableBy': None} 2015-07-22 06:30:32,958 INFO Config finding global option default-region 2015-07-22 06:30:32,958 INFO Config novalue for default-region 2015-07-22 06:30:32,958 INFO Config finding global option max-retries 2015-07-22 06:30:32,958 INFO Config novalue for max-retries 2015-07-22 06:30:32,958 INFO Config finding global option timeout 2015-07-22 06:30:32,958 INFO Config novalue for timeout 2015-07-22 06:30:32,962 INFO DescribeImages parameters: {'Action': 'DescribeImages', 'ImageId.1': 'emi-4e95cc1e', 'Version': '2014-06-15'} 2015-07-22 06:30:32,962 INFO EC2 sending request (attempt 1 of 3) 2015-07-22 06:30:32,964 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\ncompute.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773\n/\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKIKK5XVV87MKHZFFACP&Action=DescribeImages&ImageId.1=emi-4e95cc1e&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2015-07-22T13%3A30%3A32Z&Version=2014-06-15' 2015-07-22 06:30:32,964 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: AxXK75zmhv1AniUCOzdzxai+plwbcqeXFJqj2W2q9+c= 2015-07-22 06:30:32,964 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data 2015-07-22 compute.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773 2015-07-22 06:30:32,977 DEBUG EC2 request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.2.0-21-gc6cd736 (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-504.23.4.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.2.3 requests/1.1.0 2015-07-22 06:30:32,977 DEBUG EC2 request data: AWSAccessKeyId: AKIKK5XVV87MKHZFFACP 2015-07-22 06:30:32,978 DEBUG EC2 request data: Action: DescribeImages 06:30:33,148 DEBUG EC2 response header: content-length: 843 2015-07-22 06:30:33,148 DEBUG EC2 response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 2015-07-22 06:30:33,148 DEBUG DescribeImages -- response content -- 67b125a7-12d2-4ca0-862b-a97c05cdbf04emi-4e95cc1e699337203324/ubuntu-wily-amd64-ebs-hvm-v4failed699337203324falsex86_64machineubuntu-wily-amd64-ebs-hvm-v4Ubuntu Wily x86-64 EBS-Backed EMI v4ebs/dev/sda/dev/sdbephemeral0hvm 2015-07-22 06:30:33,149 DEBUG DescribeImages -- end of response content -- IMAGE emi-4e95cc1e 699337203324/ubuntu-wily-amd64-ebs-hvm-v4 699337203324 failed private x86_64 machine ebs hvm BLOCKDEVICEMAPPING EPHEMERAL /dev/sdb ephemeral0 {code} *Steps* See EUCA-11175 for steps. *Additional Notes* stateReason is optional for [Image data type|http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/API_Image.html] on AWS. However, I think any time we can leverage the [stateReason type|http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/API_StateReason.html] when an issue is hit regarding EC2 resources, it would help with triage from an end-user point of view.
fields.summary: Failed EMI Creation Doesn't Contain stateReason attribute under certain conditions
